organization.description: An archive of the datasets hosted on https://leedsdatamill.org
organization.title: leeds-datamill-archive
organization.name: leeds-datamill-archive

name: pedestrian-crossing-points
notes:
A dataset to show the traffic light crossing points in Leeds giving road name, postcode, easting and northing. The data consists of

  • road junctions which contain signalled crossing points.
  • signalled crossings which can consist of pedestrian crossings including Pelicans, Puffins, Toucans and One-can crossings

Additional Information

  • For more information on pedestrian crossings please visit:

    https://www.gov.uk/using-the-road-159-to-203/pedestrian-crossings-191-to-199
title: Pedestrian Crossing Points
